channel.title: Sharing on ownCloud Product
channel.description: Recent content in Sharing on ownCloud Product

item.title: Links
item.description: This document describes the features around ‘Links’ from the perspective of the owner. The perspective of a recipient is described in the section ‘Resources’. User stories Private Link As a user I want to be able to refer to shared resources by posting a static link (that never changes) on other media like email, chat rooms Link that can grant access (Public Link) As a user (owner) I want to collaborate on any resource quickly & easily with anybody.
